title: Inadequecy of Mozilla / Thunderbird forms to provide information re existing monthly donations etc.
content:
I am an aged pensioner of limited means & have already provided monthly donation to Mozilla & possibly other parts thereof & now you're asking for more donations from those in favor of / & already supporting. Does you're management of various aspects of your endeavours need to be rationalised??? & so increase support for your causes? Thunderbird, Mozilla & perhaps other aspects thereof?

I have 2 email addresses in use noelgodson303@gmail.com & noelgodson9@aussiebroadband.com.au but this form has not been assembled to be informed of such situations!

Noel Godson Sydney Australia

title: Can't buy items online using Firefox
content: Hi Starting this weekend I have been unable to purchase items online using Firefox browser on my Windows Desktop. On the weekend I tried to purchase an item from PolarPro, but when I clicked on the checkout button it was unresponsive. I thought it likely that there was a glitch in their website and made the purchase using my iPad. Then today I tried to buy an item from Bandcamp and again had the ssame problem. When I clicked to confirm the purchase my screen was unresponsive. I tried to send an email to you guys and clicking on the send button, same again - nothing happened. This is a new thing and quite frustrating. Let's see if this email gets through. Cheers Richard Wedekind
creator: veryred

title: Nettisivujen evästekyselyt katoavat ennen vastaamista
content: Hei, viime viikkoina useat nettisivut ovat alkaneet toimimaan siten, että evästekyselyn ikkuna katoaa ennenkuin siihen ennättää edes vastaamaan. Olen yrittänyt ennakoida tilannetta joillakin sivuilla, mutta vaikka ennättäisinkin klikkaamaan painiketta "Kiellä kaikki evästeet", vaikuttaa kuitenkin siltä, että painikkeen klikkaaminen ei vaikuta mihinkään. Voiko tämän yksityisyyskyselyn aukioloaikaa pidentää pysyvästi siten, että evästeasetuksia ei tarvitsisi joka kerta alkaa etsimään sivuston syövereistä?
creator: Rambe
